Plague (Tests for Yersinia pestis by Culture and Identification Method)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    33685-9 Yersinia pestis [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Organism specific culture
    33686-7 Yersinia pestis [Presence] in Isolate by Organism specific culture
    33688-3 Yersinia pestis Ag [Presence] in Isolate by Immunofluorescence
    33692-5 Yersinia pestis DNA [Presence] in Isolate by NAA with probe detection
    33693-3 Yersinia pestis [Presence] in Isolate by Phage lysis
